title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 340 - Procedure Before Psychology Practice Committee
content:

State Regulations
§ 340.1 - Application to practice podiatry or for rerating
§ 340.2 - Investigation of application
§ 340.3 - Notification to applicant of nonapproval
§ 340.4 - Investigation and hearing procedure
§ 340.5 - Conduct of hearing
§ 340.6 - Decision of committee
§ 340.7 - Committee chairman, secretary

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 340

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13[a], [h][3], 13-k, 117, 141

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
